body:
Hey, if you are looking for some answers after reading this manga i can help you after my research

First of all: ¿The black guy pages are canon?
Answer: NO, the black guy pages were just a guest chapter from other artist.

Second question: If the black guy pages aren't canon then there is no ntr?

Answer: Yes and no. In other chapter you can see the characters profile and Yui's profile (The mc gf) says she is a adult videos actor. So, yes there is ntr in other chapter

What about the girl with the black hair?

Answer:She is Mina and for some reason only appears in this chapter, if you look other chapter you will see the mc teacher called Yuna but nothing about Mina (Probably cuz this is the chapter zero and the creator wanted to change this in future chapters)

And the most important question:What is the order of the chapters?

Answer: There is no order. Is just like a slice of life about a mc with a porn actress gf and his teacher who was a gal when she was in highschool.
Hope i help
To confusing and the story was boring,all over the place and just not good
Gonna be honest, I saw that there was so many chapters in this series that I just lost interest. It was too much of a hassel to figure out continuity since it's not numbered so imma bounce
Yea the one before the gang bang is canon
So, pages 44-53(sanagi torajirou) and 54-59(andou hiroyuki), are not considered canon? since they are from different artists?
Uh page 33? Wtf is up withthe feet
to be more specific, it was a guest chapter from Andou Hiroyuki while the series creator is [ Insert (KEN)]

I did some fast research and the chapter with the black guy is just a guest chapter, not written by the main creator of the series so you can consider it non canon, or just think of it as the ultimate end of the series if you want.

i see so many chapter with title "Boku dake no Bakunyuu"
can someone tell me where i must start this series?

after all woman can't resist a many coock
and that little brat can satidfy them XD
My mind is suddenly imaginating the sing Hatsune Hiku rolling days while the MC in this story just running around killing people
I feel like there's a massive skip between the first and the second chapter
cant stop laughing at that black guy
Continuity error? Wasn't he still in contact in the end and was fine with it?
I think he shouldn't know about it
This is terible they betrayed him
